title: Software Engineer 2
description: As a Software Engineer on the OneDrive and SharePoint Authentication and Authorization Team, I collaborated on the development of an advanced access control policy, Restricted Access Control, which allows tenant admins to limit access to specified users and prevent oversharing. I also worked on data governance reports that provide insights into access denials through these advanced policies, utilizing technologies such as C# and ASP.NET.

title: Software Engineer
description: As a Software Engineer on the Reply At Mentions team, I developed secure and reliable authentication modules. I streamlined operations by automating the renewal process for active monitoring of Reply At Mentions endpoints, reducing development effort by 75%. Additionally, I contributed to a key project that involved relaying task edits from the Planner service to Excel.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: In the Fast Data Technologies team, which handles over 5 trillion events, I designed and implemented a monitoring service for exception data pipelines and built an alerting system. This development significantly reduced on-call effort by improving the efficiency of exception handling and response.
